trans-unit.source: They're the same thing. A URI is a generalization of a URL. Originally, URIs were planned to be divided into URLs (addresses) and URNs (names) but then there was little difference between a URL and URI and http URIs were used as namespaces even though they didn't actually locate any resources.
trans-unit.target: 他们是同一回事 。 URI是URL的概括。 最初，原计划将URI分为URL（地址）和URN（名称），但是URL和URI之间几乎没有什么区别，即使实际未找到任何资源，http URI也用作命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) is a uniquely identify AWS resources.
trans-unit.target: 亚马逊资源名称（ARN）是唯一标识AWS资源。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: RFC 3986 defines URIs as scheme://authority/path?query#fragment

trans-unit.source: Not "all URLs are URIs". It depends on the interpretation of the RFC. For example in Java the URI parser does not like [ or ] and that's because the spec says "should not" and not "shall not".
trans-unit.target: 不是 “所有URL都是URI”。 它取决于RFC的解释。 例如，在Java中，URI解析器不喜欢 [ 或 ] ，这是因为规范说“应该”而不是“不应该”。

trans-unit.source: TN, Chennai 600 001, Loyola is URL
trans-unit.target: TN，金奈600001，Loyola是URL

trans-unit.target: URI =>统一资源标识符标识资源的完整地址，即位置，名称或两者。

trans-unit.source: URNs are URIs that are used as pure resource names rather than locators. For example, the URI: mid:0E4FC272-5C02-11D9-B115-000A95B55BC8@stackoverflow.com is a URN that identifies the email message containing it in its 'Message-Id' field. The URI serves to distinguish that message from any other email message. But it does not itself provide the message's address in any store.
trans-unit.target: URN是用作纯资源名称而不是定位符的URI。 例如，URI： mid：0E4FC272-5C02-11D9-B115-000A95B55BC8@stackoverflow.com是一个URN，它在“消息ID”字段中标识包含该消息的电子邮件。 URI用来将该消息与任何其他电子邮件消息区分开。 但是它本身并不在任何商店中提供邮件的地址。

trans-unit.source: fig. 1 is a URI
trans-unit.target: 图。 1是一个URI

trans-unit.source: fig. 1 is a URN
trans-unit.target: 图。 1是URN

trans-unit.source: fig. 2 is a URI
trans-unit.target: 图。 2是一个URI

trans-unit.source: fig. 2 is a URL
trans-unit.target: 图。 2是网址

trans-unit.source: A URI can be further classified as a locator, a name, or both. The term "Uniform Resource Locator" (URL) refers to the subset of URIs that, in addition to identifying a resource, provide a means of locating the resource by describing its primary access mechanism (e.g., its network "location"). The term "Uniform Resource Name" (URN) has been used historically to refer to both URIs under the "urn" scheme [RFC2141], which are required to remain globally unique and persistent even when the resource ceases to exist or becomes unavailable, and to any other URI with the properties of a name.
trans-unit.target: URI可以进一步分类为定位符，名称或两者。 术语“统一资源定位符”（URL）指的是URI的子集，除了标识资源外，它还通过描述资源的主要访问机制（例如，其网络“位置”）提供了一种定位资源的方式。 历史上一直使用术语“统一资源名称”（URN）来指代“ urn”方案[RFC2141]下的两个URI，即使资源不再存在或变得不可用，它们也必须保持全局唯一性和持久性。具有名称属性的任何其他URI。

trans-unit.source: A URI can be further classified as a locator, a name, or both. The term “Uniform Resource Locator” (URL) refers to the subset of URIs that, in addition to identifying a resource, provide a means of locating the resource by describing its primary access mechanism (e.g., its network “location”).
trans-unit.target: URI可以进一步分类为定位符，名称或两者。 术语“统一资源定位符”（URL）指的是URI的子集，除了标识资源外，它还通过描述资源的主要访问机制（例如，其网络“位置”）提供了定位资源的方式。

trans-unit.source: A URI identifies a resource either by location, or a name, or both. More often than not, most of us use URIs that defines a location to a resource. The fact that a URI can identify a resources by both name and location has lead to a lot of the confusion in my opinion. A URI has two specializations known as URL and URN.
trans-unit.target: URI可以通过位置或名称来标识一个资源,也可以通过名称来标识一个资源,或者两者兼而有之。很多时候,我们大多数人都是用URI来定义资源的位置。事实上,URI可以通过名称和位置来标识资源,这在我看来导致了很多混乱。URI有两个专业,分别是URL和URN。

trans-unit.source: A URI is an identifier for some resource, but a URL gives you specific information as to obtain that resource. A URI is a URL and as one commenter pointed out, it is now considered incorrect to use URL when describing applications. Generally, if the URL describes both the location and name of a resource, the term to use is URI. Since this is generally the case most of us encounter everyday, URI is the correct term.
trans-unit.target: URI是某种资源的标识符,而URL则提供了获取该资源的具体信息。URI就是一个URL,正如一位评论者指出的那样,在描述应用时使用URL被认为是不正确的。一般来说,如果URL既描述了资源的位置,也描述了资源的名称,那么应该使用URI。因为一般来说,我们大多数人每天都会遇到这种情况,所以URI才是正确的术语。

trans-unit.source: A URL is a URI that, in addition to identifying a resource, provides means of acting upon or obtaining a representation of the resource by describing its primary access mechanism or network "location".
trans-unit.target: URL是一种URI,除了识别资源外,还通过描述资源的主要访问机制或网络 "位置 "来提供对资源采取行动或获得资源的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: A URL is a specialization of URI that defines the network location of a specific resource. Unlike a URN, the URL defines how the resource can be obtained. We use URLs every day in the form of http://stackoverflow.com, etc. But a URL doesn’t have to be an HTTP URL, it can be ftp://example.com, etc.
trans-unit.target: URL是URI的一种特殊形式，它定义了特定资源的网络位置。 与URN不同，URL定义了如何获取资源。 我们每天都使用http://stackoverflow.com等形式的URL。但是URL不必是HTTP URL，可以是 ftp://example.com 等。

trans-unit.source: A URL is a specialization of URI that defines the network location of a specific resource. Unlike a URN, the URL defines how the resource can be obtained. We use URLs every day in the form of http://example.com etc. But a URL doesn't have to be an HTTP URL, it can be ftp://example.com etc., too.
trans-unit.target: URL是URI的一种特殊形式，它定义了特定资源的网络位置。 与URN不同，URL定义了如何获取资源。 我们每天都使用 http://example.com 等形式的URL。但是URL不必是HTTP URL，也可以是 ftp://example.com 等。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is a compact sequence of characters that identifies an abstract or physical resource.
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符(URI)是一种识别抽象或物理资源的紧凑字符序列。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is a string of characters which identifies an Internet Resource.
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符(URI)是一串字符,用于识别互联网资源。

trans-unit.source: A small addition to the answers already posted, here's a Venn's diagram to sum up the theory (from Prateek Joshi's beautiful explanation):
trans-unit.target: 除了已经发布的答案之外，这里还有一小部分是维恩图，用于总结理论（摘自Prateek Joshi的优美解释 ）：

trans-unit.source: A uniform resource identifier(URI) represents something of a big picture. You can split URIs/ URIs can be classified as locators (uniform resource locators- URL), or as names (uniform resource name-URN), or either both. So basically, a URN functions like a person's name and the URL depicts that person's address. So long story short, a URN defines an item's identity, while the URL provides defines the method for finding it, finally encapsulating these two concepts is the URI
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符(URI)代表了一个大局观的东西。你可以把URI拆分出来 URI可以分为定位器(统一资源定位器-URL),也可以作为名称(统一资源名称-URN),或者两者兼而有之。所以基本上,URN的功能就像一个人的名字,而URL描述的是这个人的地址。所以长话短说,URN定义了一个项目的身份,而URL提供的则是定义了找到它的方法,最后封装这两个概念的就是URI

trans-unit.source: ARN Format : arn:partition:service:region:account-id:resource
trans-unit.target: ARN格式： arn:partition:service:region:account-id:resource

trans-unit.source: After reading through the posts, I find some very relevant comments. In short, the confusion between the URL and URI definitions is based in part on which definition depends on which and also informal use of the word URI in software development.
trans-unit.target: 看完帖子后,我发现了一些非常贴切的评论。总而言之,URL和URI定义的混淆,部分是基于哪个定义取决于哪个,也是在软件开发中非正式地使用URI这个词。

trans-unit.source: All the URLs are URIs, and all the URNs are URIs, but all the URIs are not URLs.
trans-unit.target: 所有的URL都是URI,所有的URN都是URI,但所有的URI都不是URL。

trans-unit.source: Although the terms URI and URL are strictly defined, many use the terms for other things than they are defined for.
trans-unit.target: 虽然URI和URL这两个术语有严格的定义,但很多人把这两个术语用在了其他的事情上,而不是用来做其他的事情。

trans-unit.source: An Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is used to identify a single document in the Web Server: For instance /questions/176264/whats-the-difference-between-a-uri-and-a-url
trans-unit.target: 统一资源标识符(Uniform Resource Identifier,URI)是用来识别Web服务器中的单个文档。例如问题176264whats-the-difference-between-a-uri-and-a-url

trans-unit.source: An Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is the term used to identify an Internet resource including the scheme( http, https, ftp, news, etc.). For instance What is the difference between a URI, a URL and a URN?
trans-unit.target: 统一资源定位符（URL）是用于标识包括方案（http，https，ftp，新闻等）的Internet资源的术语。 例如，URI，URL和URN有什么区别？

trans-unit.source: And an example (also from Prateek's website):
trans-unit.target: 还有一个例子(同样来自普尔蒂克的网站)。

trans-unit.source: Another example I like to use when thinking about URIs is the xmlns attribute of an XML document:
trans-unit.target: 在思考URI时,我喜欢用的另一个例子是XML文档的xmlns属性。

trans-unit.source: As I understand it, a URI is a description of something, following an accepted format, that can define both or either the unique name (identification) of something and its location.
trans-unit.target: 根据我的理解,URI是对某一事物的描述,它按照公认的格式,既可以定义某物的唯一名称(识别),也可以定义某物的唯一名称(识别)及其位置。

trans-unit.source: As per RFC 3986, URIs are comprised of the following pieces:
trans-unit.target: 根据RFC 3986 ，URI由以下部分组成：

trans-unit.source: As the image above indicates, there are three distinct components at play here. It’s usually best to go to the source when discussing matters like these, so here’s an exerpt from Tim Berners-Lee, et. al. in RFC 3986: Uniform Resource Identifier (URI): Generic Syntax:
trans-unit.target: 如上图所示，这里有三个不同的组成部分。 通常，讨论此类问题时最好参考消息来源，因此这是蒂姆·伯纳斯·李（Tim Berners-Lee）等的摘录。 等 在RFC 3986中：统一资源标识符（URI）：通用语法：

trans-unit.source: As web developers and programmers we will almost always be concerned with URL and therefore URI. Now a URL is specifically defined to have all the parts scheme:scheme-specific-part, like for example https://stackoverflow.com/questions. This is a URL and it is also a URI. Now consider a relative link embedded in the page such as ../index.html. This is no longer a URL by definition. It is still what is referred to as a "URI-reference" [RFC2396].
trans-unit.target: 作为Web开发人员和程序员，我们几乎总是会关注URL，因此也会关注URI。 现在，专门定义了一个URL，以包含所有部分scheme：scheme-specific-part，例如https://stackoverflow.com/questions 。 这是一个URL，它也是一个URI。 现在考虑嵌入在页面中的相对链接，例如../index.html。 根据定义，它不再是URL。 它仍然是所谓的“ URI引用” [RFC2396]。

trans-unit.source: Basically, a URI is a general identifier, where a URL specifies a location and a URN specifies a name.
trans-unit.target: 基本上,URI是一个通用标识符,其中URL指定了一个位置,URN指定了一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Because I currently share this name with other people, it's not globally unique and would not be appropriate as a URN. However, even if no other family used this name, I'm named after my paternal grandfather, so it still wouldn't be unique across time. And even if that wasn't the case, the possibility of naming my descendants after me make this unsuitable as a URN.
trans-unit.target: 由于我目前与其他人共享此名称，因此它在全球范围内并不唯一，因此不适合用作URN。 但是，即使没有其他家庭使用过这个名字，我还是以我的祖父的名字命名，因此在整个时间里它仍然不是唯一的。 即使不是这种情况，也可能以我的名字命名我的后代，这使其不适合用作URN。

trans-unit.source: Because of this common confusion, many products and documentation incorrectly use one term instead of the other, assign their own distinction, or use them synonymously.
trans-unit.target: 由于这种常见的混乱,许多产品和文献中错误地使用了一个词而不是另一个词,指定了自己的区别,或者是同义词。

trans-unit.source: But doesn't the W3C now say that URLs and URIs are the same thing?
trans-unit.target: 但现在W3C不是说URL和URI是一回事吗?

trans-unit.source: By definition URL is a subset of URI [RFC2396]. URI contain URN and URL. Both URI and URL each have their own specific syntax that confers upon them the status of being either URI or URL. URN are for uniquely identifying a resource while URL are for locating a resource. Note that a resource can have more than one URL but only a single URN.[RFC2611]
trans-unit.target: 根据定义,URL是URI的一个子集[RFC2396]。URI包含URN和URL。URI和URL都有自己的特定语法,它们都有自己的特定语法,赋予了URI或URL的地位。URN 是用于唯一标识资源,而 URL 是用于定位资源。请注意,一个资源可以有一个以上的URL,但只能有一个URN。[RFC2611]

trans-unit.source: Can a URI be both a URL and a URN?
trans-unit.target: URI可以同时是URL和URN吗?

trans-unit.source: Consider a specific edition of Shakespeare's play Romeo and Juliet, of which you have a digital copy on your home network.
trans-unit.target: 考虑一下莎士比亚戏剧《 罗密欧与朱丽叶》的特定版本，您的家庭网络上有其数字副本。

trans-unit.source: Contains information about how to fetch a resource from its location. For example:
trans-unit.target: 包含关于如何从其位置获取资源的信息。例如:

trans-unit.source: Data URI
trans-unit.target: 数据URI

trans-unit.source: Do any browsers actually know how to fetch documents by URN?
trans-unit.target: 是否有浏览器真的知道如何通过URN获取文档?

trans-unit.source: Does the difference between URL and URI have anything to do with what characters are permitted?
trans-unit.target: URL和URI的区别与允许使用哪些字符有关系吗?

trans-unit.source: Does the difference between URL and URI have anything to do with whether it has a fragment identifier?
trans-unit.target: URL和URI的区别与是否有片段标识符有关系吗?

trans-unit.source: Does the difference between URL and URI have anything to do with whether it has query parameters?
trans-unit.target: URL和URI的区别与是否有查询参数有关系吗?

trans-unit.source: Does the difference between URL and URI have anything to do with whether it is relative or absolute?
trans-unit.target: URL和URI的区别与是相对的还是绝对的有关系吗?

trans-unit.source: Due to difficulties to clearly distinguish between URI and URL, as far as I remember W3C does not make a difference any longer between URI and URL (http://www.w3.org/Addressing/).
trans-unit.target: 由于难以清楚地区分URI和URL，据我所知，W3C不再在URI和URL（ http://www.w3.org/Addressing/ ）之间产生影响。

trans-unit.source: EDIT: I had previously thought that all URLs are valid URIs, but as per comments:
trans-unit.target: EDIT:我之前认为所有的URL都是有效的URI,但根据评论,我认为。

trans-unit.source: Even if StackOverflow would allow me to hyperlink to the s3://protocol scheme, it wouldn't do you any good in locating the resource. Because it Identifies a Resource, fig. 1 is a valid URI. It is also a valid URN, because Amazon requires that the bucket (their term for the authority portion of the URI) be unique across datacenters. It is helpful in locating it, but it does not indicate the datacenter. Therefore it does not work as a URL.
trans-unit.target: 即使StackOverflow允许我超链接到 s3:// 协议方案，在定位资源方面也没有任何好处。 因为它标识 资源 ，所以。 1是有效的URI。 这也是有效的URN，因为Amazon要求存储桶（URI的 authority 部分的术语）在数据中心之间是唯一的。 这对查找它很有帮助 ，但是它并不表示数据中心。 因此，它不能用作URL。

trans-unit.source: Every URL(Uniform Resource Locator) is a URI(Uniform Resource Identifier), abstractly speaking, but every URI is not a URL. There is another subcategory of URI is URN (Uniform Resource Name), which is a named resource but do not specify how to locate them, like mailto, news, ISBN is URIs. Source
trans-unit.target: 抽象地说，每个URL（统一资源标识符）都是URI（统一资源标识符），但是每个URI都不是URL。 URI的另一个子类别是URN（统一资源），它是一个命名资源，但未指定如何定位它们，例如mailto，news，ISBN就是URI。 资源

trans-unit.source: Here is my simplification:
trans-unit.target: 下面是我的简化。

trans-unit.source: Hope you understand,
trans-unit.target: 希望你能理解。

trans-unit.source: I also tend to completely avoid the term URI and discuss things only in terms of URL or URN as appropriate, because it causes so much confusion. The question we should really try answering for people isn't so much the semantics, but how to identify when encountering the terms whether or not there is any practical difference in them that will change the approach to a programming situation. For example, if someone corrects me in conversation and says, "oh, that's not a URL it's a URI" I know they're full of it. If someone says "we're using a URN to define the resource" I'm more likely to understand we are only naming it uniquely, not locating it on a server.
trans-unit.target: 我也倾向于完全避开URI这个术语,只在适当的时候用URL或URN来讨论事情,因为它造成了太多的混乱。我们真正应该为人们尝试回答的问题,并不是语义上的问题,而是在遇到这些术语时,如何辨别它们之间是否有实际的区别,从而改变编程情况下的做法。例如,如果有人在对话中纠正我说 "哦,那不是URL,而是URI",我就知道他们说得很满。如果有人说 "我们是用URN来定义资源",我就更能理解我们只是把它唯一命名,而不是在服务器上定位。

trans-unit.source: I believe that when the word URI is used to refer to relative paths, "URI-reference" is actually what is being thought of. So informally, software systems use URI to refer to relative pathing and URL for the absolute address. So in this sense, a relative path is no longer a URL but still URI.
trans-unit.target: 我认为,当用URI这个词来指代相对路径的时候,实际上想到的就是 "URI-reference"。所以非正式地讲,软件系统用URI指的是相对路径,用URL指的是绝对地址。所以从这个意义上说,相对路径不再是URL,而仍然是URI。

trans-unit.source: I found:
trans-unit.target: 我发现。

trans-unit.source: I say "like" because these examples do not follow the required syntax.
trans-unit.target: 我说 "喜欢",是因为这些例子没有按照规定的句法。

trans-unit.source: I tend to think of URNs as being similar to GUIDs. They are simply a standardized methodology for providing unique names for things. As in the namespace declarative that uses a company's name - it's not like there is a resource sitting on a server somewhere to correspond to that line of text - it simply uniquely identifies something.
trans-unit.target: 我倾向于认为URNs类似于GUIDs。它们只是一种为事物提供唯一名称的标准化方法。就像使用公司名称的命名空间声明式一样----它并不像在某个服务器上有一个资源对应于这一行文字----它只是唯一地标识了一些东西。

trans-unit.source: I was wondering about the same thing and I've found this: http://docs.kohanaphp.com/helpers/url.
trans-unit.target: 我想知道同一件事，并且发现了这一点： http : //docs.kohanaphp.com/helpers/url 。

trans-unit.source: I've heard that I shouldn't say URL anymore, why?
trans-unit.target: 听说我不该再说URL了,为什么?

trans-unit.source: Identifies a resource by a unique and persistent name, but doesn't necessarily tell you how to locate it on the internet. It usually starts with the prefix urn: For example:
trans-unit.target: 通过唯一且持久的名称来标识资源，但不一定告诉您如何在Internet上定位它。 通常以前缀 urn: 开头：例如：

trans-unit.source: If I'm way off base - please let me know!
trans-unit.target: 如果我说的不对,请告诉我!

trans-unit.source: If you haven't already read Roger Pate's answer, I'd advise doing so as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您还没有阅读Roger Pate的答案 ，我建议您也这样做。

trans-unit.source: In Java servlets, the URI frequently refers to the document without the web application context.
trans-unit.target: 在Java servlet中,URI经常指的是没有Web应用上下文的文档。

trans-unit.source: In computing, a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is a subset of the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that specifies where an identified resource is available and the mechanism for retrieving it. In popular usage and in many technical documents and verbal discussions it is often incorrectly used as a synonym for URI, ... [emphasis mine]
trans-unit.target: 在计算中，统一资源定位符（URL）是统一资源标识符（URI）的子集，用于指定所标识资源的可用位置以及用于检索该资源的机制。 在流行用法以及许多技术文档和口头讨论中，它通常被错误地用作URI的同义词 ，... [强调我的]

trans-unit.source: In every instance that CodeIgniter uses the word URL or URI this is the difference they are talking about, though in the grand-scheme of the web, it is not 100% correct.
trans-unit.target: 在CodeIgniter使用URL或URI这个词的每一个例子中,这就是他们所谈论的区别,尽管在网络的大格局中,这并不是100%正确的。

trans-unit.source: In order to answer this I'll lean on an answer I modified to another question. A good example of a URI is how you identify an Amazon S3 resource. Let's take:
trans-unit.target: 为了回答这个问题，我将依靠我修改的另一个问题的答案 。 URI的一个很好的例子是您如何识别Amazon S3资源。 让我们来：

trans-unit.source: In summary: a URI identifies, a URL identifies and locates.
trans-unit.target: 概括而言： URI标识，URL标识和定位。

trans-unit.source: In this case com.mycompany.mynode would be a URI that uniquely identifies the "myPrefix" namespace for all of the elements that use it within my XML document. This is NOT a URL because it is only used to identify, not to locate something per se.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下,com.mycompany.mynode将是一个URI,它唯一标识了 "myPrefix "命名空间,用于我的XML文档中所有使用它的元素。这不是一个URL,因为它只是用来标识,而不是用来定位某个东西本身。

trans-unit.source: It's not an extremely clear term, really.
trans-unit.target: 这不是一个非常明确的名词,真的。

trans-unit.source: Let’s take Apache for example. If http://example.com/foo is requested from an Apache server, you’ll have the following environment variables set:
trans-unit.target: 让我们以Apache为例。 如果从Apache服务器请求http://example.com/foo ，则将设置以下环境变量：

trans-unit.source: Lets assume the following
trans-unit.target: 让我们假设以下情况

trans-unit.source: My name, Roger Pate, could be like a URN (Uniform Resource Name), except those are much more regulated and intended to be unique across both space and time.
trans-unit.target: 我的名字叫罗杰·佩特（Roger Pate），可能像URN （统一资源名称）一样，除了那些受到更严格的监管并且打算在时空上都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: No. Both URLs with and without fragment identifiers are URLs (and URIs.)
trans-unit.target: 不,有和没有片段标识符的URL都是URL(和URI)。

trans-unit.source: No. Both URLs with and without query parameters are URLs (and URIs.)
trans-unit.target: 不,带查询参数和不带查询参数的URL都是URL(和URI)。

trans-unit.source: No. Both relative and absolute URLs are URLs (and URIs.)
trans-unit.target: 不,相对和绝对的URL都是URL(和URI)。

trans-unit.source: No. URLs are defined to be a strict subset of URIs. If a parser allows a character in a URL but not in a URI, there is a bug in the parser. The specs go into great detail about which characters are allowed in which parts of URLs and URIs. Some characters may be allowed only in some parts of the URL, but characters alone are not a difference between URLs and URIs.
trans-unit.target: 不,URL被定义为URI的严格子集。如果解析器允许在URL中使用一个字符,但不允许在URI中使用,则说明解析器有问题。规范中对URL和URI的哪些字符被允许出现在URL和URI的哪些部分进行了详细说明。有些字符可能只允许在URL的某些部分中出现,但仅仅是字符并不是URL和URI的区别。

trans-unit.source: Not that I know of, but modern web browser do implement the data URI scheme.
trans-unit.target: 据我所知不是这样,但现代网络浏览器确实实现了数据URI方案。

trans-unit.source: Now lets see a precise example
trans-unit.target: 现在让我们来看一个准确的例子

trans-unit.source: People talk about URLs, URIs, and URNs as if they're different things, but they look the same to the naked eye.
trans-unit.target: 人们谈论URL ， URI和URN好像是不同的东西，但是用肉眼看起来都是一样的。

trans-unit.source: Please refer for more details:
trans-unit.target: 更多详情请参考。

trans-unit.source: Points to meta data about a document rather than to the document itself. An example of a URC is one that points to the HTML source code of a page like: view-source:http://example.com/
trans-unit.target: 指向有关文档的元数据，而不是文档本身。 URC的一个示例指向页面的HTML源代码，例如： view-source:http://example.com/

trans-unit.source: Popular confusion
trans-unit.target: 大众的困惑

trans-unit.source: Put simply, URL is the full way to indentify any resource anywhere and can have different protocols like FTP, HTTP, SCP, etc.
trans-unit.target: 简单的说,URL是对任何地方的任何资源进行标识的完整方式,可以有FTP、HTTP、SCP等不同的协议。

trans-unit.source: Rather than locating it on the internet, or naming it, data can be placed directly into a URI. An example would be data:,Hello%20World.
trans-unit.target: 可以将数据直接放置到URI中，而不必在Internet上定位或命名。 一个例子是 data:,Hello%20World 。

trans-unit.source: Roger Pate
trans-unit.target: 罗杰-佩特

trans-unit.source: See this document. Specifically,
trans-unit.target: 请参阅本文档 。 特别，

trans-unit.source: So all URLs are URIs (actually not quite - see below), and all URNs are URIs - but URNs and URLs are different, so you can't say that all URIs are URLs.
trans-unit.target: 所以所有的URL都是URI(其实不完全是--见下文),所有的URN都是URI--但URN和URL是不同的,所以不能说所有的URI都是URL。

trans-unit.source: So that muddies the waters further, unfortunately.
trans-unit.target: 所以,很不幸的是,这样一来,水就更浑浊了。

trans-unit.source: So, how do URI, URL, and URN differ in this case?
trans-unit.target: 那么,在这种情况下,URI、URL和URN有什么不同呢?

trans-unit.source: Some URIs provide information to locate a resource (such as a DNS host name and a path on that machine), while some are used as pure resource names. The URL is reserved for identifiers that are resource locators, including 'http' URLs such as http://stackoverflow.com, which identifies the web page at the given path on the host. Another example is 'mailto' URLs, such as mailto:fred@mail.org, which identifies the mailbox at the given address.
trans-unit.target: 一些URI提供了用于定位资源的信息（例如DNS主机名和该计算机上的路径），而另一些URI则用作纯资源名。 该URL保留用于作为资源定位符的标识符，包括诸如http://stackoverflow.com之类的“ http” URL，该URL标识主机上给定路径上的网页。 另一个示例是“ mailto” URL，例如mailto：fred@mail.org ，它标识给定地址处的邮箱。

trans-unit.source: That would also be a URI, but more specifically a URL because it locates the text.
trans-unit.target: 那也将是URI，但更具体地说是URL，因为它可以找到text 。

trans-unit.source: That would be a URI, but more specifically a URN* because it names the text.
trans-unit.target: 那将是一个URI，但更具体地说是URN *，因为它为text命名 。

trans-unit.source: The URI describes the protocol for accessing a resource (path) or application (query) on a server (authority).
trans-unit.target: URI描述用于访问服务器（ 授权机构 ）上的资源（ 路径 ）或应用程序（ 查询 ）的协议。

trans-unit.source: The URL for fig. 1 is http://www-example-com.s3-website-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/
trans-unit.target: 图的URL 。 1是http://www-example-com.s3-website-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/

trans-unit.source: The W3 spec for HTML says that the href of an anchor tag can contain a URI, not just a URL. You should be able to put in a URN such as <a href="urn:isbn:0451450523">. Your browser would then resolve that URN to a URL and download the book for you.
trans-unit.target: HTML的W3规范指出， 定位标记的 href 可以包含URI，而不仅仅是URL。 您应该能够放入诸如 <a href="urn:isbn:0451450523"> 之类的URN。 然后，您的浏览器会将该URN解析为URL，并为您下载该书。

trans-unit.source: The answer is ambiguous. In Java it is frequently used in this way:
trans-unit.target: 答案是模棱两可的。在Java中,它经常用这种方式。

trans-unit.source: The definition of URI has changed over the years, so it makes sense for most people to be confused. However, you can now take solace in the fact that you can refer to http://somesite.com/something as either a URL or URI ... an you will be right either way (at least fot the time being anyway...)
trans-unit.target: URI的定义多年来已经发生了变化，因此对于大多数人来说，将其弄混是有意义的。 但是，您现在可以放心，因为您可以将http://somesite.com/something作为URL或URI来引用...这两种方法都是正确的（至少现在还没有。） ）

trans-unit.source: The definition of URN is now looser than what I stated above. The latest RFC on URIs says that any URI can now be a URN (regardless of whether it starts with urn:) as long as it has "the properties of a name." That is: It is globally unique and persistent even when the resource ceases to exist or becomes unavailable. An example: The URIs used in HTML doctypes such as http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd. That URI would continue to name the HTML4 transitional doctype even if the page on the w3.org website were deleted.
trans-unit.target: 现在，URN的定义比我上面所述的宽松。 最新的URI RFC规定 ，任何URI现在只要具有“名称的属性”，就可以成为URN（无论它是否以 urn: 开头）。 即：即使资源不再存在或变得不可用，它也是全局唯一且持久的。 例如：HTML文档类型（例如 http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd )中使用的URI。 即使删除了w3.org网站上的页面，该URI仍将继续命名HTML4过渡文档类型。

trans-unit.source: The most common URI is the Uniform Resource Locator (URL) which identifies an Internet domain address. Another, not so common type of URI is the Universal Resource Name (URN).
trans-unit.target: 最常见的URI是统一资源定位器(URL),用于识别互联网域名地址。另一种不那么常见的URI是通用资源名称(URN)。

trans-unit.source: There are two basic subsets - URLs, which define location (especially to a browser trying to look up a webpage) and URNs, which define the unique name of something.
trans-unit.target: 有两个基本的子集--URLs,它定义了位置(特别是对试图查找网页的浏览器来说)和URNs,它定义了事物的唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: These are some very well-written but long-winded answers. Here is the difference as far as CodeIgniter is concerned:
trans-unit.target: 这是一些写得很好但冗长的答案。 就CodeIgniter而言，这是区别：

trans-unit.source: This is a locator, which is an identifier for that physical location. It is like both a URL and URI (since all URLs are URIs), and also identifies me indirectly as "resident of..". In this case it uniquely identifies me, but that would change if I get a roommate.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个定位器，是该物理位置的标识符。 它就像一个URL和URI（因为所有URL都是URI）一样，并且还间接地将我标识为“ ..的居民”。 在这种情况下，它唯一地标识了我，但是如果我得到室友，那将会改变。

trans-unit.source: This is my name, which is an identifier. It is like a URI, but cannot be a URL, as it tells you nothing about my location or how to contact me. In this case it also happens to identify at least 5 other people in the USA alone.
trans-unit.target: 这是我的名字,是一个标识符。它就像一个URI,但不能是一个URL,因为它不能告诉你任何关于我的位置或如何联系我的信息。在这种情况下,它也恰好可以识别出至少5个其他的人在美国的身份。

trans-unit.source: This is one of the most confusing and possibly irrelevant topics I've encountered as a web professional.
trans-unit.target: 这是我作为一个网络专业人士遇到的最令人困惑,也可能是最不相关的话题之一。

trans-unit.source: This might be the reason for some of the confusion.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是造成一些困惑的原因。

trans-unit.source: To reach a person: Driving(protocol others SMS, email, phone), Address(hostname other phone-number, emailid) and person name(object name with a relative path).
trans-unit.target: 要联系一个人。驾驶(协议他人短信、邮件、电话)、地址(主机名其他电话、邮箱、邮箱地址)、人名(对象名相对路径)。

trans-unit.source: URC -- Uniform Resource Citation
trans-unit.target: URC-统一资源引用

trans-unit.source: URI -- Uniform Resource Identifier
trans-unit.target: URI- 统一资源标识符

trans-unit.source: URI => (URL + URN) or URL only or URN only
trans-unit.target: URI =>（URL + URN）或仅URL或仅URN

trans-unit.source: URI => http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Identifier
trans-unit.target: URI => http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Identifier

trans-unit.source: URI is a resource on the current domain, so it needs less information to be found.
trans-unit.target: URI是当前域上的资源,所以需要的信息量比较少。

trans-unit.source: URI is kind of the super class of URL's and URN's. Wikipedia has a fine article about them with links to the right set of RFCs.
trans-unit.target: URI是URL和URN的超类。 维基百科上有一篇很好的文章 ，其中包含指向正确的RFC的链接。

trans-unit.source: URI is your Name
trans-unit.target: URI就是你的名字

trans-unit.source: URI(Uniform Resource Identifier) => https://www.google.com/folder/page.html
trans-unit.target: URI（统一资源标识符）=> https://www.google.com/folder/page.html

trans-unit.source: URI, URL, URN
trans-unit.target: URI、URL、URN

trans-unit.source: URI: can be either a URN or a URL. This fuzzy definition is thanks to RFC 3986 produced by W3C and IETF.
trans-unit.target: URI:可以是URN或URL。这个模糊的定义归功于W3C和IETF制定的RFC 3986。

trans-unit.source: URIs are a standard for identifying documents using a short string of numbers, letters, and symbols. They are defined by RFC 3986 - Uniform Resource Identifier (URI): Generic Syntax. URLs, URNs, and URCs are all types of URI.
trans-unit.target: URI是使用简短的数字，字母和符号字符串标识文档的标准。 它们由RFC 3986-统一资源标识符（URI）：通用语法定义 。 URL，URN和URC都是URI 类型 。

trans-unit.source: URIs came about from the need to identify resources on the Web, and other Internet resources such as electronic mailboxes in a uniform and coherent way. So, one can introduce a new type of widget: URIs to identify widget resources or use tel: URIs to have web links cause telephone calls to be made when invoked.
trans-unit.target: URI是由于需要以统一和一致的方式识别Web资源以及其他Internet资源（例如电子邮箱）而产生的。 因此，可以引入一种新型的窗口小部件：用于标识窗口小部件资源的URI或使用tel： URI使Web链接导致在调用时进行电话呼叫。

trans-unit.source: URL -- Uniform Resource Locator
trans-unit.target: URL- 统一资源定位器

trans-unit.source: URL Format : [scheme]://[Domain][Port]/[path]?[queryString]#[fragmentId]
trans-unit.target: URL格式： [scheme]://[Domain][Port]/[path]?[queryString]#[fragmentId]

trans-unit.source: URL is your address with your name in-order to communicate with you.
trans-unit.target: URL是您的地址和您的名字,以便与您沟通。

trans-unit.source: URL's are a subset of URI's (which also contain URNs).
trans-unit.target: URL是URI的一个子集(其中也包含URN)。

trans-unit.source: URL(Uniform Resource Locator) => https://www.google.com/
trans-unit.target: URL（统一资源定位符）=> https://www.google.com/

trans-unit.source: URL: "where" to find it ( eg https://google.com/pub?issnid=1234-5678 .. or ftp://somesite.com/doc8.pdf )
trans-unit.target: URL：在哪里可以找到它（例如https://google.com/pub?issnid=1234-5678 ..或ftp://somesite.com/doc8.pdf ）

trans-unit.source: URLs always start with a protocol (http) and usually contain information such as the network host name (example.com) and often a document path (/foo/mypage.html). URLs may have query parameters and fragment identifiers.
trans-unit.target: URL始终以协议（ http ）开头，并且通常包含诸如网络主机名（ example.com ）之类的信息，并且通常包含文档路径（ /foo/mypage.html ）。 URL可能具有查询参数和片段标识符。

trans-unit.source: URN -- Uniform Resource Name
trans-unit.target: URN- 统一资源名称

trans-unit.source: URN Format : urn:[namespace identifier]:[namespace specific string]
trans-unit.target: URN格式： urn:[namespace identifier]:[namespace specific string]

trans-unit.source: URN(Uniform Resource Name) => /folder/page.html
trans-unit.target: URN（统一资源名称）=> /folder/page.html

trans-unit.source: URN: unique resource name, i.e. "what" (eg urn:issn:1234-5678 ). This is meant to be unique .. as in no two different docs can have the same urn. A bit like "uuid"
trans-unit.target: URN:唯一的资源名称,即 "什么"(例如urn:issn:1234-5678)。这是唯一的.....因为没有两个不同的文档可以有相同的urn。有点像 "uuid"

trans-unit.source: URNs
trans-unit.target: URNs

trans-unit.source: URNs are different from URLs in this rigid uniqueness constraint, even though they both share the syntax of URIs.
trans-unit.target: 在这个刚性的唯一性约束中,URN和URL是不同的,尽管它们都共享URI的语法。

trans-unit.source: URNs can identify ideas and concepts. They are not restricted to identifying documents. When a URN does represent a document, it can be translated into a URL by a "resolver". The document can then be downloaded from the URL.
trans-unit.target: URNs可以识别思想和概念。它们并不限于识别文档。当URN确实代表一个文档时,可以通过 "解析器 "将其翻译成URL。然后可以从URL中下载该文档。

trans-unit.source: We have address https://www.google.com/folder/page.html where,
trans-unit.target: 我们的地址为https://www.google.com/folder/page.html ，

trans-unit.source: What are the distinguishable differences between them?
trans-unit.target: 它们之间有什么明显的区别?

trans-unit.source: What is the difference between a URI, a URL and a URN
trans-unit.target: URI、URL和URN有什么区别?

trans-unit.source: Wikipedia
trans-unit.target: Wikipedia

trans-unit.source: Wikipedia will give all the information you need here. Quoting from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URI:
trans-unit.target: 维基百科将在此处提供您需要的所有信息。 从http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URI引用：

trans-unit.source: With mod_rewrite enabled, you will also have these variables:
trans-unit.target: 启用mod_rewrite后,你也会有这些变量。

trans-unit.source: Yes. The W3C realized that there is a ton of confusion about this. They issued a URI clarification document that says that it is now OK to use the terms URL and URI interchangeably (to mean URI). It is no longer useful to strictly segment URIs into different types such as URL, URN, and URC.
trans-unit.target: 是。 W3C意识到对此存在很多困惑。 他们发布了URI澄清文档 ，说现在可以互换使用URL和URI（表示URI）了。 将URI严格划分为不同的类型（例如URL，URN和URC）不再有用。

trans-unit.source: You can see a clear example using the url::current() method. If you have this URL: http://example.com/kohana/index.php/welcome/home.html?query=string then using url:current() gives you the URI which, according to the documentation, is: welcome/home
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 url::current() 方法看到一个清晰的示例。 如果您具有以下URL ： http://example.com/kohana/index.php/welcome/home.html?query=string : //example.com/kohana/index.php/welcome/home.html?query=string，则使用 url:current() 会给您提供URI ，根据文档，该URI为： Welcome /家

trans-unit.source: You could also identify the text as file://hostname/sharename/RomeoAndJuliet.pdf.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以将文本标识为 file://hostname/sharename/RomeoAndJuliet.pdf 。

trans-unit.source: You could identify the text as urn:isbn:0-486-27557-4.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将文本标识为 urn:isbn:0-486-27557-4 。

trans-unit.source: a URL is a type of URI that identifies a resource via a representation of its primary access mechanism (e.g., its network "location"), rather than by some other attributes it may have.
trans-unit.target: URL是一种类型的URI,它通过其主要访问机制(如网络 "位置")的表示来识别资源,而不是通过它可能具有的其他属性来识别资源。

trans-unit.source: also http://www-example-com.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html
trans-unit.target: 也是http://www-example-com.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html

trans-unit.source: but not http://www-example-com.s3.amazonaws.com/ (no datacenter and no filename is too generic for Amazon S3)
trans-unit.target: 但不是http://www-example-com.s3.amazonaws.com/ （对于Amazon S3，没有数据中心，也没有文件名太通用）

trans-unit.source: file://ip_server/path_segments
trans-unit.target: file://ip_server/path_segments

trans-unit.source: ftp://ip_server/path
trans-unit.target: ftp://ip_server/path

trans-unit.source: in Amazon's S3-US-West-2 datacenter.
trans-unit.target: 在亚马逊的S3-US-West-2数据中心中。

trans-unit.source: in the above you can communicate with a page called firstpage.html (URI) using following http://www.google.com/fistpage.html(URL).
trans-unit.target: 在上面，您可以使用以下http://www.google.com/fistpage.html（URL ）与名为firstpage.html （ URI ）的页面进行通信。

trans-unit.source: ldap://hostport/dn?attributes?scope?filter?extensions
trans-unit.target: ldap://hostport/dn?attributes?scope?filter?extensions

trans-unit.source: mailto:email-address
trans-unit.target: mailto:email-address

trans-unit.source: my address is TN, Chennai 600001.
trans-unit.target: 我的地址是TN,Chennai 600001.

trans-unit.source: my name is Loyola
trans-unit.target: 我叫洛约拉

trans-unit.source: news:newsgroup-name
trans-unit.target: news:newsgroup-name

trans-unit.source: schemes are https,ftp,gopher,mailto,news,telnet,file,man,info,whatis,ldap...
trans-unit.target: 方案是HTTPS,FTP,Gopher,mailto,news,telnet,file,man,info,whatis,ldap.....

trans-unit.source: telnet://ip_server/
trans-unit.target: telnet://ip_server/

trans-unit.source: urn: and : stand for themselves.
trans-unit.target: 瓮:和:代表自己。

trans-unit.source: urn:isbn:096139210x
trans-unit.target: urn:isbn:096139210x

trans-unit.source: which I created as a cached copy of
trans-unit.target: 我把它作为一个缓存副本创建的
